description:
The more fun it is to apply, the more likely you are to use it. Sun Bum’s aerosol sunscreen is easy to use, goes on sheer and has a dry touch. The continuous spray coats and protects your skin from harmful UVA and UVB rays, while enriching your skin with vitamin E.

  • Broad-spectrum UVA and UVB protection
  • Water-resistant rating of 80 minutes
  • Gluten and paraben free
  • Oil free
  • Cruelty free and 100% vegan
  • Ingredients: avobenzone 3.00%, homosalate 15.00%, octisalate 5.00%, octocrylene 7.00%, alcohol denat., c12-15 alkyl benzoate, acrylates/octylacrylamide copolymer, dicaprylyl carbonate, ppg-5-ceteth-20, fragrance, tocopherol
name: Sun Bum Premium SPF 50 Sunscreen Spray
